__Your weekly deals__

Earn rewards when you shop with our brand partners, and let your rewards get invested automatically!

Welcoming 4 of our new brand partners on Raiz Rewards! Get exclusive perks with __Hilton Honors__, buy travel passes with __Go City__, shop the latest wear by __Kenzo,__ and check out __Omron__’s healthcare products to take charge of your health.

Shop online with our brand partners via Raiz Rewards and earn a percentage of your purchase invested back into your Raiz account. \*

Just click the “__Shop Online Here__” button via Raiz Rewards and we’ll direct you to our brand partner’s app or website. Shop like normal, and you will be on your way to get rewarded.

So, as you shop, you invest!

*\*Terms & Conditions apply.*

### __New Brands__

__Hilton Honors____![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Hilton-Honors.png)__

__(+ 1.75% invested)__

Swipe, ride, drive, dine, and fly your way to fabulous rewards. Hilton Honors offers lots of ways to earn and use points every day, your way. Book a hotel, earn rewards, plan your trip, and so much more.

Book online now with __Hilton Honors__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __1.75%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Omron  
![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Omron.png)__

__(+0.49% invested)__

__Omron__ develops and manufactures health equipment for home and medical use, health management software, and health promotion services.

Book online now with __Omron__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __4.9%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Go City![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Go-City.png)__

__(+3.5% invested)__

__Go City__ are the world’s largest sightseeing pass business. Discover the best attractions, tours, and experiences, all on one pass.

Book online now with __Go City Travel Pass__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __3.5%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Kenzo  
![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/blog-size-900-x-506px-5.png)  
__

__(+2.45% invested)__

__Kenzo__ is a French luxury fashion house that is known for its Asian influence on traditional European styles.

Shop online now with __Kenzo__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __2.45%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

### __Promotions__

__Shopee__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/blog-size-900-x-506px-8.png)

__(+up to 6.37% invested)__

Shop online now with __Shopee__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to 6.37%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Special Promotion:__ __Shopee’s 7.7 Mid-Year Sale (from now until 7 July)__

*   Free shipping with a minimum spend of RM7
*   Shopee users can collect golden tickets daily through the “Spin & Win BMW X1” game in Shopee App. The more golden tickets users collect, the higher the chance of winning the prize.
*   Get 77% coins cashback voucher with RM0 minimum spend capped at 300 Coins.

*\*All promotions are subjected to terms & conditions set by the brand partners.*
